parsed_action.reasoning: With no recent signals, run a small pricing test aligned to inventory and typical category elasticity. Electronics: moderate inventory and generally higher WTP → +15% to $22.99 to probe margin. Home Goods: lowest inventory → slight increase to $21.99. Apparel: highest inventory and typically price-sensitive → reduce to $18.99 to drive velocity. .99 endings aid perceived value while keeping margins safely above cost basis.
